sentences.sContent: A series of international meetings held over the last ten weeks will culminate in the Geneva meeting.
sentences.sContent_eng: A series of international meetings held over the last ten weeks will culminate in the Geneva meeting.
sentences.sCn: 过去十周内举行的一系列国际会议将于这次日内瓦会议达到高潮。

synos.tran: 到绝顶；达到高潮；达到顶点

remMethod.val: culmin(顶点) + ate → 达到顶点 → (以某种结果)告终
